column1: OMG!!!  I mean your pies are amazing as always but these are NEXT LEVEL.  I am gobsmacked yet again by your genius!

This is brilliant! After making the base and cooking it in the oven, do you then put the body of the princesses in the oven? It looks like they are painted and then added to the base, but I did not see them look as if they had been put in the oven.
Wow - thank you for the kind words! :)
Yep, they were baked before being added (otherwise they'd be too floppy :)
